class.name: FBXMesh
class.description: FBXMesh handles 3D mesh data imported from FBX files. It includes properties for blend channels, blend weights, instance materials, and the mesh itself.

members.member: An array of integers representing the blend channels of the mesh.
An array of floats representing the blend weights of the mesh.
An array of Material objects representing the materials used in the mesh.
The [ImporterMesh] object representing the mesh itself.
